personal.name: Shivashankar Chandrashekaraiah (Shiv)
personal.title: AI Backend Engineer
personal.tagline: Building scalable AI-powered products from the ground up with expertise in backend systems and LLM applications
personal.bio: Software Developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable products from the ground up. I specialize in AI backend systems, LLM-powered applications, and cloud infrastructure. With a Master's in Computer Science from UT Dallas (GPA 3.8) and hands-on experience at AI startups, I love turning complex problems into elegant, high-performance solutions. From processing millions of messages daily to deploying ML models to millions of devices, I thrive on building systems that scale.

experience.description: Engineering robust backend systems for AI-powered communication platform, focusing on scalable task queues, RAG pipelines, and dynamic AI agent tooling.
highlights: Engineered a resilient task queue using Celery and Redis to manage OpenAI API rate limits (TPM) and ensure reliable delivery of text messages
Built a RAG pipeline using Pinecone, solved challenges related to large file sizes, custom chunking method for CSV files
Built a dynamic tool calling functionality for AI agents, helping users create custom tool calling functionalities for their AI agents

experience.description: Architected and scaled backend systems for a customer support voice AI platform, from MVP to processing 1 million messages daily.
highlights: Collaborated on MySQL database design and implemented caching systems to efficiently support 100,000 daily inbound/outbound calls by managing Twilio's CPS and concurrent stream constraints
Architected backend system for customer support voice AI platform using WebSockets, FastAPI, Redis, and Express.js to manage real-time audio streams via Twilio with sub-second latency
Developed an AI-driven reminder scheduling system targeting inactive customer conversations, projected to improve conversion rates by 25%
Launched the platform by onboarding the first paying customer and scaled the backend to process 1 million messages daily
Implemented React-based UI features and established CI/CD pipelines to accelerate deployment and testing cycles

experience.description: Led development of AI-powered video features, mentored junior engineers, and drove product roadmap for the Android app.
highlights: Led development of 'Video Smart Cropping' - a deep learning-based, saliency-aware video cropping solution using object localization
Improved processing times by 30% through parallel processing techniques and AWS Lambda container deployments
Prompt engineered GPT-3.5-Turbo for text summarization to enhance short video creation
Implemented 'Face Transformation' AI filter and face similarity using FaceNet embeddings
Mentored junior engineers and conducted code reviews

experience.description: Designed AWS infrastructure for delivering encrypted deep learning models to Android devices, enabling super-resolution capabilities deployed to millions of devices.
highlights: Designed AWS infrastructure for delivering encrypted deep learning models to Android devices
Enabled super-resolution capabilities on mobile devices
Successfully deployed the system to millions of Android devices during a POC with Hotstar IPL

projects.title: Motion Tracking
projects.description: AI camera filter that dynamically follows facial movements to create engaging videos. Built using Camera2, Mediapipe, OpenGL, and Kotlin on Android. Commended by co-founder for exceeding quality expectations.

projects.title: Face Transformation
projects.description: AI filter that fuses two faces together in a dramatic, smooth manner using face detection and Delaunay triangulation. Extended with face similarity using FaceNet embeddings and cosine similarity metrics.

projects.title: Gesture Recognition
projects.description: Enables screen interaction through pointing gestures. Users can select options displayed on screen using hand gestures detected via computer vision.

projects.title: Voice AI Platform Backend
projects.description: Real-time voice AI platform with sub-second latency processing 1000+ daily calls. Architected using WebSockets, NodeJS, Redis for Twilio audio streams with GPT-4 integration.

projects.title: Redis-Style In-Memory Datastore
projects.description: A lightweight, Redis-inspired in-memory key-value store built in Java with RESP-style serialization, Java NIO for handling multiple client connections, and minimal persistence layer using periodic snapshots.

projects.title: RAG Chatbot with Custom Transformer
projects.description: Built and trained a Transformer model from scratch using PyTorch to create sentence embeddings. Finetuned Llama-2-7B chat model to answer questions by fetching relevant documents from ChromaDB vector database.

projects.title: PII Identification Benchmarking
projects.description: Whitepaper comparing PII identification systems including AWS Comprehend, MS Presidio, and Protecto. Created in collaboration with Dataxpert.ai for detecting personally identifiable information in unstructured text.

projects.title: Video Smart Cropping
projects.description: State-of-the-art saliency-aware video cropping using object detection and localization. Achieved 30% reduction in processing time, deployed on AWS Lambda containers.

projects.title: Song Lyrics Analysis
projects.description: Performs sentiment classification and lyrics generation using dual approaches with Word2Vec, K-Means clustering, and Neural Networks. Features interactive Gradio interface.

projects.title: Deep CNN from Scratch
projects.description: Implements convolutional neural network layers including forward and backward propagation from scratch using only NumPy for deep understanding of CNN internals.

projects.title: Fovea Stream (Super Resolution)
projects.description: Real-time video super resolution on Qualcomm DSPs using ESRGAN model. Deployed to millions of Android devices during Hotstar IPL POC. Reduced AWS costs by 15%.

projects.title: Custom YOLO Object Detection
projects.description: Customized YOLO implementation for recognizing specific objects with fine-tuned detection capabilities.

projects.title: Facial Expression Recognition
projects.description: Classifies emotional expressions from facial features using deep learning and expression classification techniques.
